column3: 2015 at 2:00 p.m. at the Qualls Funeral Home Chapel in Cave City with Bro. Mark Vance officiating. Burial will follow in the Spotts Cemetery located at Poughkeepsie with arrangements by Qualls Funeral Home of Cave City.  Visitation will be Thursday
